EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_TDWI Greenplum eBook_Q216.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for downloading the Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software TDWI e-book. We know you're likely considering options for data warehouse modernization and evaluating platforms to deploy new analytical workloads, including data science and advance analytics. We appreciate the opportunity to show you our open source data management solutions to help you accelerate your open source analytical journey.
For more information about our leading open source data warehouse and related topics that were discussed in the eBook, please visit:
Introducing Greenplum: World’s First Open Source MPP Data Warehouse <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/introducing-greenplum-worlds-first-open-source-mpp-data-warehouse]]> Pivotal Greenplum: The Open Source Massively Parallel Data Warehouse <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-greenplum]]> Pivotal Greenplum Open Source Community <[[http://greenplum.org/]]> Pivotal BDS: Open Source, Scale-out Data Management Portfolio <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite]]>
Pivotal is powering enterprise transformation by serving as a trusted partner to enterprises building, evolving, scaling and adapting to the new realities of the digital economy. Contact us <[[http://pivotal.io/contact]]> to learn how Pivotal can help advance your Big Data analytics initiatives.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
